title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: Pressing the Delete button deletes the first item on the second row. Additionally, when the delete occurs, the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: The Launch item should stay on the second row even after deleting an item from the second row in the Coolbar.
SR:
To reproduce:  
1. Open the Coolbar.  
2. Click the Delete button.  
3. Observe the movement of the Launch item to the first row.
